channel.title: Government changes
channel.description:
If you could change any law that is currently active. What would it be? and why?
You can also create any law and also What would it be and why?

item.title: Government changes
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

I know, How is legalization/decriminalization of recreational use of marijuana “shit” it was just processed in proposition 19 in California.
Get educated kids this shit is current, a pot head knows more then you guys.
as long as alcohol is legalized and cannabis isn’t, i will make a statement in every way i can.

Read full topic

item.title: Government changes
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:57, topic:368746”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=464887.msg3408164#msg3408164 date=1290473594]
Legalize cannabis
[/quote]
Why do threads always turn into shit.[/quote]

Legalizing cannabis is a legitimate change. It’s just these people who say “Oh yah make pot legal so i can get high n school and walk around flaunting my rebellious nature.” that make it seem otherwise. Ending the prohibition would have numerous benefits to everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Government changes
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

what i would do?
lets see
get our ass out of every countries’ buisness, see how good they do without us screwing up our country for them,
then? Stop handing out cash to companies, to people, etc., another way our government is dieing, wait a few years, let the economy recover, and laugh at the countries who are corrupting because we did not help them through their tough time, and also call us idiots, i dont see any other country helping the US?
and for those 9 year olds who said to make marijuana legal and smoking at a young age, you kids are idiots. Kill more people, amiright? you think everyone is going to think your cool because you posted about drugs and tobacco? if anything, smoking should be banned, nation would be much healthier, they could actually do a job instead of coughing all day from smoking.

Read full topic
